thread.section_title: American Advisors Group Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of American Advisors Group | americanadvisorsgroup.com
thread.title: Pam
thread.title_full: American Advisors Group reviewed by Pam

author: Pam
title: Pam
text:
Relinquishing the ownership of your most prized possession is really
harder than buying your home. We stewed about it since I was 62. At
age 69 we decided to get the information. I typed in some question and
AAG was the one to answer me. I talked to an "agent" Denise Schelhaas.
After finding out more and more about it, we decided that this sounded
pretty good for us. So with Denise's help and prepping this was made
easy. Actually I am really thankful that this Reverse Mortgage program
is available. I think it was just the ticket for us. It was such a relief to
pay off bills and have a cushion too.
